div.div:
Superintendent's Message
Welcome to Smith-Green Community Schools!
My name is Daniel Hile, and I am honored to serve as the superintendent of SGCS. Located approximately 15 miles northwest of Fort Wayne, Smith-Green Community Schools is housed in one K-12 building in the heart of Churubusco. Our unique ...

Click to read more about: Non-Discrimination

span.p:
Parents,
You have the ability to deposit money into your child's cafeteria account from home! By visitingSendMoneytoSchool you can deposit money, view purchase history, transfer money between kids and have other options as well. You will need to know your child's student ID number in order to create an account and each deposit transaction costs only $2.00. Please click here for parent instructions on creating an account and making your first deposit.

The Smith-Green Community School Corporation, located in Churubusco, Indiana, serves students from Smith and Green Townships (71 square miles) in Whitley and Noble counties respectively. Housed in a single PK-12 facility are Churubusco Elementary School and Churubusco Jr-Sr High School. Although both schools are located in one facility, they represent separate and distinct environments with their own administrative, instructional, and support staff. The Smith-Green Community School Corporation serves approximately 1250 students in a comprehensive instructional program.
